name: Aditya Shivhare
college: Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology

education.school: Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Real Time Chat Application
projects.description: Designed and implemented engaging user interfaces utilizing React.js and JavaScript for dynamic frontend experiences. Leveraged JavaScript to enhance real-time communication functionalities, including instant messaging, notifications, and user presence indicators. Designed and crafted an intuitive user interface and responsiveness using Sass (scss). Integrated features such as real-time messaging, authentication, and multimedia file sharing using Firebase.

projects.name: E-commerce
projects.description: Designed a 100% responsive Full-stack application utilizing Python Django for backend functionality and JavaScript for frontend interactivity. Developed robust backend functionalities using Django framework, implementing features such as user authentication, guest checkout functionality, and payment gateway through Paypal Rest API. Utilized JavaScript for frontend development, ensuring seamless user experiences through interactive interfaces and responsive design.

experiences.description: Developed 100% responsive and visually appealing websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated with design and back-end teams to implement user interface designs. Implemented animations and transitions to enhance user experience. Stayed up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies.
